items.name: Component_Animation
items.content:
# =================================================================== # # Script: Component_Animation # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class Component_Animation extends gs.Component ###* * The base-class of all animation components. An animation-component * executes a certain animation on a game object. The type of the animation depends * on the component.
*
* In regular, animation components a used together with the gs.Component_Animator * component. * * @module gs * @class Component_Animation * @extends gs.Component * @memberof gs * @constructor ### constructor: -> super @name = "animation" ###* * Updates the animation. * * @method update ### update: -> @object.needsFullUpdate = yes ###* * Skips the animation. That is used to skip an animation if the user * wants to skip very fast through a visual novel scene. * * @method skip ### skip: -> if @easing?.duration > GameManager.tempSettings.skipTime if GameManager.tempSettings.skipTime == 0 @easing.time = @easing.duration else @easing.duration = GameManager.tempSettings.skipTime @easing.time = 0 ###* * Indicates if instant-skipping is enabled. In that case, there shouldn't be any delay and animation * must finish immediately and call its callback. It is mostly used for live-preview purposes. * * @method isInstantSkip * @return {boolean} If true, instant-skipping is enabled. Otherwise false. ### isInstantSkip: -> GameManager.tempSettings.skip and GameManager.tempSettings.skipTime == 0 gs.Component_Animation = Component_Animation
